resources.string: It would be an honor to hear from you. Thank you.
Globally acceptable pronunciation and neutralized accent
Clear and logical progression of ideas
Ability to respond to different cultural cues

5 - Expert User : The agent has full operational command of the language with only occasional unsystematiic inaccuracies and inappropriacies. The CSR can handle complex argumentation and description well. The agent would perform at senior/middle management level in a call center. Very complex CSR level.

4 - Very Good User: The agent has very good operational command of the language though with occasional minor inaccuracies. He generally handles complex language well, understands, and can make detailed reasoning\'s on complex and demanding calls. The agent would perform well at middle management level, QA, training and team leader, complex CSR level.

3 - Good User : The agent has a generally effective command of the language despite some inaccuracies and misunderstandings. He can use and understand fairly moderately complex or routine language, and handle calls in a satisfactory manner causing minimum frustration to the caller. The agent will improve fast with support and CSR experience. Moderately complex/routine CSR level.

2 - Modest User : The agent has partial command of the language coping with overall meaning in most situations, though is likely to make many mistakes. He should be able to handle basic communication in routin situations. Would perform at routine CSR level only.

1 - Limited User : The agent\'s basic competence is limited to familiar questions. He has frequent problems in understanding and expression. The agent is not able to use complex language. Communication breakdowns frequently occur. Should be able to do routine processing work.
